mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, payDate, receiveCompanyId, payUsage, payAmount, tsc, tsu
mapper.select:
SELECT fukuan.id, fukuan.orderId, fukuan.hsId, fukuan.payDate, fukuan.receiveCompanyId, fukuan.payUsage, fukuan.payAmount, fukuan.tsc, fukuan.tsu, huikuanmap.amount AS huikuanmap_amount, huikuan.id AS huikuan_id, huikuan.orderId AS huikuan_orderId, huikuan.hsId AS huikuan_hsId, huikuan.huikuanCompanyId, huikuan.huikuanDate, huikuan.huikuanAmount, huikuan.huikuanUsage, huikuan.huikuanMode, huikuan.huikuanBankPaper, huikuan.huikuanBankPaperDate, huikuan.huikuanBankDiscount, huikuan.huikuanBankDiscountRate, huikuan.huikuanBankPaperExpire, huikuan.huikuanBusinessPaper, huikuan.huikuanBusinessPaperDate, huikuan.huikuanBusinessDiscount, huikuan.huikuanBusinessDiscountRate, huikuan.huikuanBusinessPaperExpire, huikuan.tsc AS huikuan_tsc, huikuan.tsu AS huikuan_tsu
FROM hs_same_fukuan fukuan LEFT JOIN hs_same_huikuan_map huikuanmap ON fukuan.id = huikuanmap.fukuanId LEFT JOIN hs_same_huikuan huikuan ON huikuanmap.huikuanId = huikuan.id WHERE fukuan.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and fukuan.deleted =0

select t1.id, t1.orderId, t1.hsId, t1.payDate, t1.receiveCompanyId, t1.payUsage, t1.payAmount, t1.tsc, t1.tsu from hs_same_fukuan t1
t1.deleted = 0 and t1.orderId = #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and t1.hsId = #{hsId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and t1.payDate = #{payDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t1.receiveCompanyId = #{receiveCompanyId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and t1.payUsage = #{payUsage, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.payAmount = #{payAmount, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.payDate, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{payDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.payDate, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{payDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by t1.payDate asc

select
from hs_same_fukuan where orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0 and payUsage !='TRADE_DEFICIT' order by payDate asc
SELECT FROM hs_same_fukuan WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted =1
SELECT FROM hs_same_fukuan WHERE orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted =0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM hs_same_fukuan WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted=0
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_same_fukuan SET deleted = 1, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hs_same_fukuan ( id, orderId, hsId, payDate, receiveCompanyId, payUsage, payAmount, tsc, tsu ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiveCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, current_timestamp )

insert into hs_same_fukuan
id, orderId, hsId, payDate, receiveCompanyId, payUsage, payAmount, tsc, tsu,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiveCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, current_timestamp
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_same_fukuan SET orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, payDate = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receiveCompanyId = #{receiveCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, payUsage = #{payUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payAmount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
